name: Brave the Storm
description:
Submission for the "Random Asset Flip Jam" January 2022.

Random Words Used for Theme

Desperate, Disaster, Penetrate, Village

Assets Used

  • Aura 2, by Oniric Studio [https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/particles-effects/aura-2-volumetric-...]
  • Boats, by Lukas Bobor [https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/sea/boats-pack-67293]
  • Fullscreen Editor, by Muka Schultze [https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/utilities/fullscreen-editor-69534]
  • Filebase Asset Library, by GameDevHQ [https://filebase.gamedevhq.com/]
  • Pro Radar Builder, by DaiMangou [https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/utilities/pro-radar-builder-52837]
  • Residential Buildings Pack, by Gabro Media [https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/urban/residential-building...]
  • SUIMONO Water System, by Tanuki Digital [https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/suimono-water-system-4387]
  • Weather Maker, by Digital Ruby (Jeff Johnson) [https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/particles-effects/weather-maker-volu...]
  • Boat Controller Script, obtained from Ditzel Games via a YouTube tutorial, "Boat Controller - Unity Ocean Tutorial 4/4" []

Skeleton Code Used

C# script used as a base class for generic Singleton classes.
